DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine association acid reflux cell change Barrett 's esophagus . Specific aim 1 : To test hypothesis control acid reflux associate lesser degree stromal activation . Specific aim 2 : To test hypothesis stromal fibroblast derive growth factor drive BE epithelial proliferation .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Acid Reflux Stromal Epithelial Interaction Barrett 's Esophagus
DOC.criteria: 1 . Prior histological demonstration Barrett 's esophagus endoscopically visible ; length visible segment > /= 1 cm 2 . Absence dysplasia LGD biopsy within past 5 year 3 . Ability provide inform consent 4 . Age 18 year 90 year study entry . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status 3 4 2 . Inability tolerate endoscopic procedure 3 . Pregnancy : Females childbearing age screen pregnancy test . 4 . Prior esophageal surgery , cancer
